markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Soft-Landing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1391)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 89

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** applied to boots, cape, cloak, or umbrella

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This item creates a small cushion of air that catches you when you fall. You treat falls as 10 feet shorter.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You begin to fall;  **Effect** You gain the effects of [_feather fall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=111) for 1 minute or until you stop falling, whichever comes first.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Soft-Landing
